attributes.action: Let the BNP go back on Question Time
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Question Time had a real opportunity to 'expose' Nick Griffin's political viewpoint, which would have discouraged voters much more than replaying the race card. Tell me something I don't know about the BNP.
Expose him properly for his lack of political understanding to the voters.

rejection.details: Participation in Question Time is a matter for the BBC, not Government
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
